original_text:
“If someone ventures a word with you, will you be impatient?
    But who can keep from speaking?
korean_text: 누가 네게 말하면 네가 싫증을 내겠느냐, 누가 참고 말하지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If someone ventures a word with you
But who can keep from speaking?
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 누가 말하지 않고 있을 수 있겠는가?
